properties.title: Mineral Health Spa St. Margrethen
properties.abstract: Treat yourself to a few relaxing hours or an entire day: in the Mineral Health Spa St.Margrethen you will find diverse possibilities to do something good for your body and your soul.
properties.description: The Mineral Health Spa in St.Margrethen offers you outdoor and indoor pools with lying water bubble pools and flowing mineral water bath. Further more it offers a scented steam grotto, a sauna park, a solarium, a sunbathing field, physiotherapy, massages and a caf√©/Restaurant.
properties.name: Mineralheilbad St. Margrethen
